ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will verify that all required fields are populated for the My Genome integration.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( $Setup.Americord_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rule__c,FALSE, ( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(LPI_My_Genome__c)), OR( ISBLANK(Lab__r.Mothers_Email__c), ISBLANK(Lab__r.Mothers_Date_Of_Birth__c), ISBLANK(Lab__r.Mother_s_Phone__c), ISPICKVAL(Lab__r.Shipping_State_new__c, ''), ISBLANK( Lab__r.Shipping_City__c ) , ISBLANK( Lab__r.Shipping_Street__c ) , ISPICKVAL(Lab__r.Shipping_Country_new__c, '') ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Required My Genome fields not populated. You must enter Mother's Email, Mother's Phone Number, Mother's DOB and Shipping information on the Lab record.
